transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Ji Bharat ji baat kar rahe hain sir?

Customer: Hain?

Executive: Bharat sir baat kar rahe hain na sir abhi aapka ek aapne ek wo raise kara tha sir ki aapko account manager se baat karna hai sir ek aapka ticket aaya tha.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Ji bataiye sir.

Customer: To number likho aap us pe phone karo. Ek number du?

Executive: Haan sir number bata dijiye sir.

Customer: 85293

Executive: Ek minute sir.

Executive: 85

Customer: 293

Executive: 293

Customer: 94

Executive: 94

Customer: 356

Executive: 356 kya naam rahega sir inka?

Customer: Bharat Bharat Agarwal.

Executive: Bharat Agarwal.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Inka note dala tha na sir aapne note dala tha ki wants to connect with account manager to aapne dala tha inhone Bharat ji ne kara tha sir ye?

Customer: Unhone hi dala tha.

Executive: Chaliye main baat kar leta hu thik hai sir. Haan number wapas repeat kar do.

Customer: 85293

Customer: Haan.

Customer: 94356

Customer: Haan thik hai sir.

Executive: Main kar raha hu sir.

Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to connect with account manager.



Resolution:

- Executive took the number to connect.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, connect, number
